title: W Longing
lyrics:
This cold pool
Glowing against the night
Is the only thing
I believe is right
I swing my arms

Against the air

Swift with longing

Longing



Tell me what you wanna hear

I want you to hear it

Tell me what you wanna feel

You know I want to near it



I get high

Alone tonight

And I ask myself

If you could be mine



I hold my breath

Motionless

My lungs pink with black air

Black air



Tell me what you wanna hear

I want you to hear it

Tell me what you wanna feel

You know I want to near it



Be good to yourself

You are powerful

Practice being kind

It's the only truth



I hold my breath

Motionless

My lung pink with black air

Black air
